comment:
Crazy. There's a lady on YouTube dedicated to Heards innocence and being abused. The lady sounds so crazy and infatuated. She claims the only reason people don't believe it is because Heard is a women. But when you mention all the men in Hollywood who were either found guilty of abuse or had many allegations come out against them. She just ignores it. When you mention the actual testimony or statements against Heard she just says to "why don't you watch my video before saying stuff you don't know, moron".
Lol. It's crazy. 
I loathe domestic violence or any man who strikes a woman. I wasn't raised like that and men who hit women are equal to child molesters in my book. But people like Heard who lie about abuse as they themselves are the abuser. Nothing is worse. She is a pig
Edit: it's not about Depp supporters or Heard supporters. Don't frame it like that. There is nothing on her side to support. She is ruining the chance for any woman to come out. I'm never a white knight. But this is messed up
